content.text: Pretty good, just got home from work!
Me too! I just got back from watching 16 Candles with my family.
Oh yeah? I love that movie! What did you think of it?
I loved it! It was so funny and relatable.
Yeah, I know what you mean! I love how the main character is so relatable.
Me too! She's just like me!
What do you do for work?
Oh, that's cool! I'm a family man from the midwest with a passion for theatre.
Oh, that's awesome! I love theatre!
Me too! I'm actually working on my own juice business and creating some new content for my YouTube channel.
Oh, that's cool! I've always wanted to start my own business.
It's definitely not easy, but it's worth it.
I bet! I'm sure you'll do great!
